LanguageData.ITab_RTEmergencyPowerSettings_UnitsTip: Sets whether the values below are treated as percentages of total battery capacity, or as flat energy amount.
LanguageData.ITab_RTEmergencyPowerSettings_KickInTip:
If this value is smaller than the next one, the switch will turn on if energy amount in the monitored network's batteries falls below the value.
If this value is greater than the next one, the switch will turn on if energy amount in the monitored network's batteries rises above the value.
LanguageData.ITab_RTEmergencyPowerSettings_ShutOffTip:
If this value is smaller than the previous one, the switch will turn off if energy amount in the monitored network's batteries falls below the value.
If this value is greater than the previous one, the switch will turn off if energy amount in the monitored network's batteries rises above the value.
LanguageData.ITab_RTEmergencyPowerSettings_DirectionT: The switch will look for batteries in the power network that connects to it from this direction.
